channel.title: Approximate Nearest Neighbors on Blanket
channel.description: Recent content in Approximate Nearest Neighbors on Blanket

item.title: Billion Scale Similarity Search With GPUs (2017)
item.description: The paper Billion-scale-similarity search with GPUs presents an approximate nearest-neighbor search method that uses GPUs and combines the IVFADC indexing structure with Batcher’s bitonic sorting network. The authors have implemented this method in a library called faiss.
